description: Two-panel huipil, square cut neck with applied velvet fabric at neck and sleeve; geometric patterning fills upper 2/3 of front and back; diamonds, zigzags, dots, is done primarily in red with green and purple accents; open at sides.

title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
